allow: Bash(powershell.exe -Command "where.exe ruby; where.exe jekyll; where.exe bundle")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-ChildItem ''C:\\Ruby*'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object FullName; Get-ChildItem ''C:\\Program Files\\Ruby*'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object FullName")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-ChildItem ''C:\\Program Files\\Ruby*'',''C:\\Program Files \(x86\)\\Ruby*'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object FullName")
